Title: Grants campus peace officers employed by the city university of New York police powers; repealer
Summary: Grants campus peace officers employed by the city university of New York police powers on its campuses and other property of the city university, including any portion of a public highway which crosses or abuts such property.
LawCode: Rpld ยง2.10 sub 79, amd ยง1.20, CP L; amd ยง6206, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the education law, in relation to granting police officer status to university campus peace officers employed by the city university of New York; and to repeal certain provisions of the criminal procedure law relating thereto
